nodes.name: DaiPriceOracle

nodes.documentation: Get the new price that would be stored if updated right now.
nodes.name: getBoundedTargetPrice

nodes.documentation:
Get the DAI-USDC price that this contract will move towards when updated. This price is
not bounded by the variables governing the maximum deviation from the old price.
nodes.name: getTargetPrice

nodes.documentation:
Get the DAI-USDC price according to Curve.
     * @return  The DAI-USDC price in natural units as a fixed-point number with 18 decimals.
nodes.name: getCurvePrice

nodes.documentation:
Get the DAI-USDC price according to Uniswap.
     * @return  The DAI-USDC price in natural units as a fixed-point number with 18 decimals.
nodes.name: getUniswapPrice

devdoc.author: dYdX * PriceOracle that gives the price of Dai in USDC.

getCurvePrice().return: The DAI-USDC price in natural units as a fixed-point number with 18 decimals.

getUniswapPrice().return: The DAI-USDC price in natural units as a fixed-point number with 18 decimals.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: DaiPriceOracle

getBoundedTargetPrice().notice: Get the new price that would be stored if updated right now.

getCurvePrice().notice: Get the DAI-USDC price according to Curve.

getTargetPrice().notice: Get the DAI-USDC price that this contract will move towards when updated. This price is not bounded by the variables governing the maximum deviation from the old price.

getUniswapPrice().notice: Get the DAI-USDC price according to Uniswap.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
